snippet.title: PREY FOR THE GODS Pre-Alpha Gameplay — Shadow of the Colossus' Spiritual Successor
snippet.description:
Check out almost 4 minutes of pre-alpha gameplay from Prey for the Gods, a hybrid action-survival game built around large scale encounters with gigantic bosses.
Subscribe: https://goo.gl/qw3Ac7

Check out our full video catalog: https://goo.gl/Cqt2cn
Visit our playlists: https://goo.gl/pM7TNe
Like Polygon on Facebook: https://goo.gl/GmkOs4
